author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The purpose of this PR is to:  
   * introduce different cluster charge fitting procedures: 
       * `legacy` = pure Landau PDF (default for PCL)
       * `DDRng` = pure Landau PDF with data-driven fit range 
       * `DDRngAllConv` = convolution of Landau with Gaussian PDF for all APVs
       * `DDRngConvExceptTOBL5L6` = convolution of Landau with Gaussian PDF for all APVs excepted for TOB L5 and L6;
   * add the possibility to retrieve an additional control ntuple out of the `SiStripGainsPCLHarvester` (by default off)
   * add calibtree -> `ALCAPROMPT` conversion plugin (`SiStripGainsCalibTreeWorker`) with example configs;
   * add unit tests for exercising the  calibtree -> `ALCAPROMPT` conversion plugin
  
#### PR validation:

Relies on the unit tests which are introduced here: 

`scramv1 b runtests_testSSTGainPCL_fromCalibTree`
